sense.def:
A hawk
je velika ptica s krivim kljunom, ostrimi kremplji in zelo dobrim vidom.

seg.quote: A hawk hovered, motionless, in the blue sky.

sense.def:
To hawk something around
pomeni poskusiti nekaj prodati med prenašanjem s kraja na kraj;

cit.quote: krošnjariti, ponujati od vrat do vrat

seg.quote: His writings were being hawked round German publishers.
